name: Read-o-bot - practise reading
description:
When children start learning to read, consistent practice is the key to success. To motivate your child to read, it is ideal if it is fun and there is a sense of achievement. This game tells a story that gives the child a sense of progress and ensures that your child continues to practice.

Ideal for beginning readers in primary school.

The game offers:

  • practice reading individual words (randomly selected from over 1000)
  • a story that motivates your child to keep practising
  • playable in English and German (text and language)
  • the story and all explanations are told in full language
  • high score list for replayability and extra motivation

This game is child-friendly as it is ad-free, contains no in-app purchases and requires no special permissions on the device.
